page.title: 13LIFESTYLES OF '85'
page.content: Some of the latest crazes since the {DEELY BOPPERS}went out of fashion is { {BREAKDANCING}and{BODY-POPPING.}A few of the moves in {BREAKDANCE} are windmills,backspins and catapillars.Some moves in body-popping are waves and moonwalk.What is the differance between {BREAKDANCE }and{ {BODY-POPPING}I hear you say?Well { {BREAKDANCE}takes part on the floor and {POPPING}takes part standing up.Fashion in the summer is shorts T.shirt and light shoes.most { {BREAKDANCERS}in {FALMOUTH}wear jackets called '{NIKES}' or{MILLETA'S which are usually made up of two colours and made of waterproof material.
